chart.name: chart.total.hours.per.day
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.visibleDuration) AS _duration, self.date AS _day FROM TimesheetLine self WHERE self.affectedToTimeSheet.user.id= :user_id AND self.affectedToTimeSheet.id= :timesheet_id GROUP BY self.date ORDER BY self.date

chart.name: chart.total.duration.per.project
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.visibleDuration) AS _duration, self.projectTask.fullName AS _project FROM TimesheetLine self WHERE self.affectedToTimeSheet.user.id= :user_id AND self.affectedToTimeSheet.id= :timesheet_id GROUP BY self.projectTask.fullName
